detaileddescription.para: this variable defines the Communication Control WakeUp_ON

this variable indicates when the Communication Control receives request 0x28 01 then sets ComControl to WakeUp_ON
values 0x01u
this variable defines the Communication Control WakeUp_OFF

this variable indicates when the Communication Control receives request 0x28 00 then sets ComControl to WakeUp_OFF
values 0x00u
this Value indicating that network type requested is AllNetworks

this variable indicates the type of network requested by tester using service 0x28
values 0x01u
this Value indicating that network type requested is MainNetwork

this variable indicates the type of network requested by tester using service 0x28
values 0xF1u
this Value of maximum time of LIN schedule change

this variable indicates the maximum value of time of LIN schedule change
values 50u
this variable indicates ORU status - running state

this variable indicates the online Remote Update Status - running state
values 4u
list of sub services supported by service 0x28

List with all available CommunicationControl (0x28) types (ControlType parameter) Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_Diag_215

simplesect.title: Input->Output-Correlation
simplesect.para: The Dcm_APPL_ComControl_EnableRxAndTx( ) receives input with sub service(0x00) leads to enable all the Rx & Tx messages on the bus & sends output as positive/negative response.
